question: What is Scorewise?
answer: Scorewise is a Canadian credit wellness platform that analyzes your credit report and provides personalized strategies to help you improve your credit score.

question: How does it work?
answer: 1. Download your free credit report with score from Equifax.ca. 2. Upload your report securely to Scorewise. 3. Receive a preview analysis, then purchase the full plan to get step-by-step improvement strategies, personalized letters, and AI support.

question: Is my credit report safe?
answer: Yes. Your credit report is never stored. It is automatically deleted after analysis. All processing is handled by our system with no human viewing.

question: Do I have to pay to see my analysis?
answer: You’ll get a free preview of your credit analysis after uploading your report. To unlock your full improvement plan and personalized tools, you can purchase the complete service.

question: Can Scorewise improve my credit score quickly?
answer: Yes, many users see results within weeks. The platform provides actionable steps such as dispute letters, pay-to-delete templates, and tailored recommendations.

question: Which credit bureau reports can I upload?
answer: Currently, Scorewise works with Equifax Canada credit reports. Support for other bureaus may be added in the future.

question: Will anyone see my personal information?
answer: No. The process is fully automated. No human will view your report or personal details.

question: Do I need a subscription?
answer: No subscription is required. You only pay when you choose to unlock your full credit improvement plan.

question: Who uses Scorewise?
answer: Thousands of Canadians have already used Scorewise to analyze their credit reports and successfully improve their scores.

question: What kind of support do I get after purchasing?
answer: Along with your personalized plan, you’ll receive AI assistant support to guide you through your credit improvement journey.

question: Who is Scorewise?
answer: Scorewise is a Canadian credit wellness platform. Our tools analyze credit reports submitted by users to provide insights and improvement strategies.

question: What information do you collect?
answer: We collect uploaded credit reports (PDF format from Equifax or TransUnion), device, browser, and language metadata, and user interactions for session-based analysis only. We do not collect your name, SIN, banking, or address details unless they are explicitly provided in the uploaded document.

question: How is my data used?
answer: Your credit report is analyzed using AI to: 1) display a preview of problematic items, 2) generate improvement letters and strategies (upon purchase), and 3) offer tailored insights. The entire process is fully automated with no human viewing.

question: How long do you keep my data?
answer: Uploaded files are automatically deleted within minutes after analysis. No copies are retained beyond the session.

question: What security measures are in place?
answer: We use SSL encryption for all file transfers. Processing takes place only on secure Canadian servers. No tracking scripts or marketing pixels are embedded.

question: How does Scorewise comply with Canadian law?
answer: Scorewise complies with PIPEDA (Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act) and CASL (Canada’s Anti-Spam Legislation). Our service is available exclusively to Canadian users.

question: What languages do you support?
answer: We support English, French, Spanish, Arabic, Russian, Hindi, and Ukrainian. However, this Privacy Policy is legally binding in English only.

question: What rights do I have regarding my data?
answer: You may contact us anytime to request deletion of your report (if still on our server) or to access a session-based summary of the data processed. Contact us at privacy@scorewise.ca.

question: How will I know if this policy changes?
answer: We will post any future changes to this Privacy Policy directly on this page. Continued use of our service means you accept the latest terms.

question: How can I contact Scorewise?
answer: You can reach us by email at privacy@scorewise.ca or through our website at https://www.scorewise.ca.
